entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lac-Mégantic
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
